title: Angular Discriminated Union Type schematics
description: Generates a new, discriminated union type for the given or default project.

name.description: The name of the type alias for the union.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the union?

discriminator.description: The name of the discriminator property on the stub interfaces.
discriminator.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for discriminator property?

path.description: The path at which to create the union definition, relative to the current workspace.

project.description: The name of the project in which to create the union. Default is the configured default project for the workspace.
